attributes.action: Allow ward staff to park in car parks at St. John’s hospital at all times
attributes.additional_details:
Car park then opens at 8am and everybody is allowed to park there. That is too late for us staff as we commence shift at 7am or 7.30am.
We are being forced to park unsafely having to walk through woods or dark underpasses where nurses have already been attacked.
We are having our cars clamped and ticketed with fines on a daily basis. We are now no longer safe to bring our cars to work and are being forced into taking public transport which doesn’t allow us to even be on time for work
attributes.background: All staff have been stopped from parking in the car parks at present. We have park off site even though there isn’t anywhere to park. We are being physically monitored by car park attendants in the morning and being quizzed as to why we are here. Staff are being made to turn around and go else where

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the hospital and local NHS bodies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
